configuration.description: This dashboard provides real-time visualization of environmental and predictive data to enhance smart agriculture practices. It integrates IoT sensor data, including temperature, humidity, and soil moisture, with machine learning predictions to assist in monitoring and decision-making for efficient crop management and irrigation control. Key features include live telemetry monitoring, historical trend analysis through time-series charts, and actionable insights for irrigation control. Customizable widgets such as gauges and tables display critical metrics, enabling farmers to make data-driven decisions that optimize resource use and improve crop yield.
